import logging

from axiomapy.session import AxiomaSession

_logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
_logger.addHandler(logging.NullHandler())



[docs]class MeAPI:
    """Access api methods of user using the active session

    """


[docs]    @staticmethod
    def get_me(
        headers: dict = None,
        return_response: bool = False,
    ):
        """This method returns the information about the current user, the teams they are in, and the resources they have access to

        Args:
            headers: Optional headers if any needed
            return_response: If set to true, the response will be returned

        Returns:
            Information about the current user
        """
        url = "/$me"
        _logger.info(f"Getting from {url}")
        response = AxiomaSession.current._get(
            url, headers=headers, return_response=return_response
        )
        return response



[docs]    @staticmethod
    def post_password(
        password: dict, headers: dict = None, return_response: bool = False,
    ):
        """This method changes the password for the current user

        Args:
            password: the new password
            headers: Optional headers if any needed
            return_response: If set to true, the response will be returned

        Returns:
            Success message if request is processed. Code 204
        """
        url = "/$me/password"
        _logger.info(f"Posting to {url}")
        response = AxiomaSession.current._post(
            url, password, headers=headers, return_response=return_response
        )
        return response
